author: Jinyan Li and Guozhu Dong and Kotagiri Ramamohanarao and Limsoon Wong
title: DeEPs: A New Instance-based Discovery and Classification System
venue: Proceedings of the Fourth European Conference on Principles and Practice of Knowledge Discovery in Databases
window: This concise pattern representation technique greatly saves the cost of DeEPs. ffl Boundary EPs (typically small in number, e.g., 81 in the mushroom data set) are considered in DeEPs' classification. The selected EPs are ``good'' representatives of all EPs occurring in the considered instance. This selection also significantly reduces the number of EPs
